column3: News;Phnom Penh: ------ Two suspects were seriously injured after they crashed while attempted a street robbery. the incident occurred at 1:10 am on------n September 14
column9: a Karaoke manager from  Sen Sok reported the pair snatched his phone as he was riding. After shouting ‘Jao’ (thief) at the top of his lungs
column10: a mob pelted the passing robbers with rocks and stones
column11: causing them to crash.------The suspects have been taken to hospital and will be questioned when they are in a fit state. The motorcycle has been confiscated.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/703890.html
